verses.verse: Then Joshua <WH3091> rose <WH7925> early <WH7925> in the morning; <WH1242> and he and all <WH3605> the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> set <WH5265> out from Shittim <WH7851> and came <WH935> to the Jordan, <WH3383> and they lodged <WH3885> there <WH8033> before <WH2962> they crossed. <WH5674>
And it came <WH1961> about at the end <WH7097> of three <WH7969> days <WH3117> that the officers <WH7860> went <WH5674> through <WH5674> the midst <WH7130> of the camp; <WH4264>

and they commanded <WH6680> the people, <WH5971> saying, <WH559> "When you see <WH7200> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> with the Levitical <WH3881> priests <WH3548> carrying <WH5375> it, then you shall set <WH5265> out from your place <WH4725> and go <WH1980> after <WH310> it.

"However, <WH389> there shall be between <WH996> you and it a distance <WH7350> of about 2000 cubits <WH520> by measure. <WH4060> Do not come <WH7126> near <WH7126> it, that you may know <WH3045> the way <WH1870> by which <WH834> you shall go, <WH1980> for you have not passed <WH5674> this way <WH1870> before <WH4480>. <WH8543> <WH8032>"
Then Joshua <WH3091> said <WH559> to the people, <WH5971> "Consecrate <WH6942> yourselves, for tomorrow <WH4279> the Lord <WH3068> will do <WH6213> wonders <WH6381> among <WH7130> you."

And Joshua <WH3091> spoke <WH559> to the priests, <WH3548> saying, <WH559> "Take <WH5375> up the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> and cross <WH5674> over <WH5674> ahead <WH6440> of the people. <WH5971>" So they took <WH5375> up the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> and went <WH1980> ahead <WH6440> of the people. <WH5971>

Now the Lord <WH3068> said <WH559> to Joshua, <WH3091> "This <WH2088> day <WH3117> I will begin <WH2490> to exalt <WH1431> you in the sight <WH5869> of all <WH3605> Israel, <WH3478> that they may know <WH3045> that just <WH9201> as I have been <WH1961> with Moses, <WH4872> I will be with you.

"You shall, moreover, command <WH6680> the priests <WH3548> who are carrying <WH5375> the ark <WH727> of the covenant, <WH1285> saying, <WH559> 'When you come <WH935> to the edge <WH7097> of the waters <WH4325> of the Jordan, <WH3383> you shall stand <WH5975> [still] in the Jordan. <WH3383>'"
Then Joshua <WH3091> said <WH559> to the sons <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> "Come <WH5066> here, <WH2008> and hear <WH8085> the words <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> your God. <WH430>"

And Joshua <WH3091> said, <WH559> "By this <WH2088> you shall know <WH3045> that the living <WH2416> God <WH410> is among <WH7130> you, and that He will assuredly <WH3423> dispossess <WH3423> from before <WH6440> you the Canaanite, <WH3669> the Hittite, <WH2850> the Hivite, <WH2340> the Perizzite, <WH6522> the Girgashite, <WH1622> the Amorite, <WH567> and the Jebusite. <WH2983>
"Behold, <WH2009> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the Lord <WH136> of all <WH3605> the earth <WH776> is crossing <WH5674> over <WH5674> ahead <WH6440> of you into the Jordan. <WH3383>
"Now <WH6258> then, take <WH3947> for yourselves twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> men <WH376> from the tribes <WH7626> of Israel, <WH3478> one <WH259> man <WH376> for each <WH376> <WH259> tribe. <WH7626>

"And it shall come <WH1961> about when the soles <WH3709> of the feet <WH7272> of the priests <WH3548> who carry <WH5375> the ark <WH727> of the Lord, <WH3068> the Lord <WH136> of all <WH3605> the earth, <WH776> shall rest <WH5117> in the waters <WH4325> of the Jordan, <WH3383> the waters <WH4325> of the Jordan <WH3383> shall be cut <WH3772> off, <WH3772> [and] the waters <WH4325> which are flowing <WH3381> down <WH3381> from above <WH4480> <WH4605> shall stand <WH5975> in one <WH259> heap. <WH5067>"

So it came <WH1961> about when the people <WH5971> set <WH5265> out from their tents <WH168> to cross <WH5674> the Jordan <WH3383> with the priests <WH3548> carrying <WH5375> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> before <WH6440> the people, <WH5971>

and when those who carried <WH5375> the ark <WH727> came <WH935> into the Jordan, <WH3383> and the feet <WH7272> of the priests <WH3548> carrying <WH5375> the ark <WH727> were dipped <WH2881> in the edge <WH7097> of the water <WH4325> (for the Jordan <WH3383> overflows <WH4390> <WH5921> all <WH3605> its banks <WH1415> all <WH3605> the days <WH3117> of harvest <WH7105>),

that the waters <WH4325> which were flowing <WH3381> down <WH3381> from above <WH4480> <WH4605> stood <WH5975> [and] rose <WH6965> up in one <WH259> heap, <WH5067> a great <WH3966> distance <WH7368> away at Adam, <WH121> the city <WH5892> that is beside <WH4480> <WH6654> Zarethan; <WH6891> and those which were flowing <WH3381> down <WH3381> toward <WH5921> the sea <WH3220> of the Arabah, <WH6160> the Salt <WH4417> Sea, <WH3220> were completely <WH8552> cut <WH3772> off. <WH3772> So the people <WH5971> crossed <WH5674> opposite <WH5048> Jericho. <WH3405>

And the priests <WH3548> who carried <WH5375> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the Lord <WH3068> stood <WH5975> firm <WH5975> on dry <WH2724> ground <WH2724> in the middle <WH8432> of the Jordan <WH3383> while all <WH3605> Israel <WH3478> crossed <WH5674> on dry <WH2724> ground, <WH2724> until <WH5704> <WH834> all <WH3605> the nation <WH1471> had finished <WH8552> crossing <WH5674> the Jordan. <WH3383>
